alert.note: Alert for Deer Lodge; Powell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:19PM MDT until July 27 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Deer Lodge County in west central Montana... Southern Powell County in west central Montana... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 419 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Galen, or 10 miles south of Deer Lodge, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Galen, Warm Springs, and Racetrack. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
